description: Ekuox focuses on promoting environmental sustainability through the production and sale of eco-friendly waste management products. The company specializes in manufacturing biodegradable bags made from organic materials, such as corn, and offers a range of products designed to facilitate waste separation and composting in both households and businesses. Recognizing the importance of reducing plastic waste, the initiative also explores the use of recycled plastic to create additional products, including pet waste bags and composting boxes. The business model emphasizes education and awareness, encouraging customers to adopt sustainable practices while providing practical solutions for waste management. Through strategic partnerships and innovative approaches, the initiative aims to expand its reach and impact, contributing to a circular economy and fostering a culture of environmental responsibility.
name: Ekuox
